text: [Music]
fairy princess
once upon a time there was a king to
whom a beautiful daughter was born he
found her so beautiful that he named her
fairy princess everyone in the court and
Kingdom accepted this somewhat different
kind of a name but one fairy called
Largey did not like it how dare he call
his ordinary human child fairy princess
I shall not tolerate this insult I shall
teach the King a lesson
so when fairy princess was barely eight
years old Largey appeared in the form of
an old woman and kidnapped the child as
she played in the palace gardens
she brought fairy princess in a
beautiful palace and made her work there
as her attendant fairy princess indeed
from now on you will tend to this fire
and ensure that it never goes out if it
does I shall send you to the monster
lark Oni to get it back and lark only
loves to turn humans into stone years
rolled by fairy princess grew up to be a
beautiful young maiden one day she was
walking past a fountain in the palace
when she suddenly saw a rainbow forming
in the flowing water she stood there to
watch it and a voice spoke to her
very princess I have been watching you
in this palace for a few weeks now would
you mind waiting a bit to talk to me are
you this rainbow yes I am the fairy of
this palace wanted to take revenge on my
father a king so she kidnapped me and
put me in a palace far away from here
for years
and now she wants to put a horrible
spell on me and so she brought me here
without my body I can only speak through
the seven colours of the rainbow
oh my father is the king - and the fairy
kidnapped me - never since I came here I
have never met anyone else me too ever
since she kidnapped me my body has been
in a magical sleep I can only speak to
you now because my body is not here I
too haven't spoken to anyone for years
can we be friends
yes I would love that it is so good to
have someone to talk to you but what is
this horrible spell she is going to put
on you I do not know all I am aware of
is that the spell can only be broken if
my body is awakened but even I do not
know where the palace I have been
sleeping it is I have only heard Largey
say that the palace is beyond monster
lock Cody's castle so how old were you
when you were brought here
in this way the rainbow prince and fairy
princess met each other every day
sharing their sorrows comforting each
other laughing and joking with each
other this went on for a long time and
they began to fall in love fairy
princess was worried about this horrible
spell that Largey was going to put on
the rainbow prince do you know when
laggy will put the spell on you no lucky
always does her important spells on the
fifth old moon of the year that is just
three days away I am going to try and
wake your body in that Palace darling we
don't even know where that palace is
except that you have to cross monster
lock Cody's den to get there and these
are magical spells we are mere humans
how will you break them I cannot let you
go it is too dangerous I am NOT seeking
your permission you know I cannot bear
the thought of you risking your life for
me and I cannot bear the thought of
anything horrible happening to you look
I don't know how to do this but I will
not give up before trying we know that
that palace where your body is sleeping
is beyond monster lock honies den so
that is where I shall go no that monster
turns humans into stone please
just stay here with me how should I ask
loggy to show me the way to that monster
den aha
I know exactly what to do
fairy princess put out the fire and as
she expected Largey was furious you let
the fire go out don't you know what I
said I would do to you if this happened
hi I am sorry knoweth now you will have
to get it from Monster Locke oh he's
dead in the dark forest takes this bring
the flame back in this that is if he
does not turn you just down unperturbed
and determined fairy princess set off
towards monster lark oh nice death she
walked into the dark forest and suddenly
she saw a deer spring past it turned and
spoke to her who I is a human like you
in this dark forest I need to go beyond
Monster lock honies dead the monster
turns humans to stone you will never let
you out alive there must be some time
during the day that he's out of his den
I shall enter his den only then that is
clever but still risky why are you
risking your life for someone else
aren't you scared I am scared for myself
and for the prince and that is why I
will not give up before trying I really
must be on my way
just as fairy princess was about to walk
off the deer suddenly changed into a
beautiful fairy
I admire your courage fairy princess and
I will help you take this use the
contents of it only when there is no
other way and remember you cannot sleep
you cannot eat till you get to the
palace where rainbow Prince lies asleep
whatever happens do not be afraid and do
not give up
thank he's so much I shall do as you say
very princess went on her way she found
monster lar Kony's den and waited behind
some trees for him to go out some time
later she did see him step into the
forest
[Music]
so she dashed inside the den to cross it
when she suddenly heard a loud evil
grunt behind her you thought you can't
you're my dear and I wouldn't know
please let me go oh you're fine piece of
stone don't covet Amira there was just
no other way she put her hand in her bag
and removed what was in it immediately
there was such a flash of such bright
light that the monster was blinded and
very priestess dashed through the dead
[Music]
now fairy princess reached another would
far in the distance was a castle the
moment she saw it she suddenly felt as
cold and hungry and tired as she had
never felt before
no no I can't sleep I have to go on if I
don't eat and rest I shall die but I
can't stop now suddenly a demon appeared
before her are you hungry
would you like it it's nice and juicy no
I have to move on and tired hungry and
sleepy fairy princess moved on
every time she held on to a tree to help
herself walk another demon would spring
up asking her to eat the fruit are you
hungry
would you like this it's nice and juicy
boo oh you only would you know this 18
oh I think you see July 12th yes nice
and juicy and every time she refused to
take the fruit a thorn would prick her
but she went on I will not give up
[Music]
it took her every last drop of willpower
to go up to the castle finally she
reached it but the doors were locked
she tried to break the lock but couldn't
so she removed the contents of the bag
yet again and she found in her hand a
key she put it in the lock he made at
least she was drawn into a magnificent
room in the middle of the room lay the
body of the rainbow Prince fast asleep
is that the prince she went up to the
prince and shook him he did not stir huh
how do I wake him it is a magical sleep
and only magic can break it
she opened the bag and removed what was
inside it was a little violin that
increased its size and then played the
most beautiful tune one has ever heard a
tune that mimicked the songs of birds
and feeling of dawn the Prince stirred
and finally woke up
very princess my love you reached me I
told you I would not give up before
trying you risked your own life to save
mine you rescued me thank you thank you
so much Sud suddenly there were great
sounds of ceremonies and a beautiful
Queen walked in with a grand procession
of noble men and women
mother my son you are finally awake now
that her spell is broken oh la he will
never be able to hurt another human
again
how did this happen rainbow prince told
his mother all about how fairy princess
had saved his life and how much they
were in love they also told the Queen
about how she had been kidnapped from
her kingdom immediately a message was
sent to fairy princesses parents they
were overwhelmed with joy to see their
beloved daughter alive and well the
families were delighted the prince and
fairy princess were married amid great
rejoicing and yes they did live happily
ever after their story just shows what
you can do if you never give up and
simply focus on making your dreams come
true doesn't it
[Music]
